text: Eleven women were confirmed to be married to the Islamic prophet Muhammad. Muslims use the term Umm al-Mu'minin (Arabic: أم ٱلْمُؤْمِنِين; meaning 'Mother of the Believers' from Quran 33:6Quran 33:6) before or after the names of Muhammad's wives as a sign of respect. == Family tree == * * indicates that the marriage order is disputed * Note that direct lineage is marked in bold. Notes == Bibliography == === Wives of Muhammad === * === Women in Islam === * * * === General === * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * Category:Lists of women
title: Muhammad's wives
